mapper.sql: id,role_id,role_code, role_name,intro,order_num, create_by,create_by_id,create_time, update_by,update_by_id,update_time, status,is_deleted,tenant_id, app_id
mapper.select: select tsr.*, turl.id as link_id, turl.valid_from, turl.expire_on from t_sys_role tsr left join t_user_role_link turl on tsr.role_id = turl.role_id ${ew.getCustomSqlSegment}

select tsr.*, turl.user_id, case when turl.user_id is not null then 1 else 0 end as disabled from t_sys_role tsr left join t_user_role_link turl on tsr.role_id = turl.role_id and turl.user_id = #{userId} and turl.is_deleted = 0 where tsr.app_id = #{appId} and tsr.is_deleted = 0

select tsu.user_id, tsu.username, turl.id as link_id, turl.valid_from, turl.expire_on, turl.create_time, turl.app_id from t_user_role_link turl left join t_sys_user tsu on tsu.user_id = turl.user_id and tsu.is_deleted = 0 where turl.is_deleted = 0 and turl.role_id = #{roleId}

select tsr.*, case when tugrl.user_group_id is not null then 1 else 0 end as disabled from t_sys_role tsr left join t_user_group_role_link tugrl on tsr.role_id = tugrl.role_id and tugrl.user_group_id = #{userGroupId} and tugrl.is_deleted = 0 where tsr.is_deleted = 0
